assets.name: CENTRALIZED EXCHANGES
assets.bestQuote: I thought exchanges did this anyway? I'm already fully cashed out and done with crypto....maybe I don't self-report, problem, HMRC? --- They don't. A few million withdrawn from various exchanges to accounts in the Caribbeans, Switzerland and the Pacifics, all exchanges had my full personal information, including tax number from my country of residency - my country of residencies tax authority consider me living under the poverty line and refund me each year a few 1000 dollar in social security taxes from my alibi job, driving 40h a month for a door dash like service. Has worked for over 10 years. All tax evasion is by now far over the statue of limitations. And as I haven't updated my personal information on cexes this 5 of 5 cycle, my accounts got all deleted. So no record remains

assets.name: ENGLISH
assets.bestQuote:
Based. Just being the best at English is what counts.

Ask yourself:
>What language can the world's richest people speak? What language does the majority of the world's wealth understand?
>What language does business get done in?
>What language do contracts get signed in?
>What language are laws made and enforced?
>What language do world governments use in crafting laws?
>In the United Nations meetings what language are countries written in?
>In the EU what language is the formal one most debates occur in despite it not being the primary language of any member state?
>If a plane flies from Argentina to China,what language will be spoken over the radio?
>If fusion were developed today, what language would the results be published in first for the world?
>What language have the most influential books in the last 200 years been written? What language is spoken in the greatest movies?
>What language are most programming languages written?

Basically it's pretty obviously English. Expand your vocabulary and get good at expressing yourself. Latin and Greek are helpful in understanding original Western thought and also aiding further understanding of English.

Spanish is a servant's language. Anyone who speaks French (and there's globally not many of them) and matters also speaks English.. There's a billion Chinese speakers but they're either poor or craving English.

narratives.text: The globally dominant language for business, wealth, law, and science, making other languages largely unnecessary for career advancement.
narratives.thread_sub: What languages are useful for advancing your career? Is learning Chinese a meme?
